ygData.subject: Re: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ya I bet you d really love having to replace something like a silvery war axe for 300 plat or a 2 hour camp. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Nov 02/99, David Knadler <dknadler@...> wrote:

> equipment as well?". A lot of people would whine about a change like this -
> I would love to see it though. What about allowing a MOB who kills you, to
> loot one item from your inventory (and then it's gone forever)? Actually,
> that might be way too drastic (I've already died 8 times this level :p )

Ya I bet you'd really love having to replace something like a silvery
war axe for 300 plat or a 2 hour camp.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
